Its funny how all these mythics that were supposed to show up in innestrad popped up here instead. It's like they didn't have enough room in the set or something. ([Worldpsine Wurm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Worldpsine Wurm) came from innestrad too)

posts.post_content:
What a boring card. It does one thing that's been seen before. Perhaps not in this particular iteration where it affects all your creatures, but it's a pretty tired mechanic to put on a MYTHIC.   
Mythics should be something that actually makes you think, they should be flavorful, and they should leave you in awe for a few seconds because it's such an interesting and original warping of the game! At least there's Rakdos as consolation in this set.
posts.html:
